description: A humorous take on time travel, where anticipation and surprise meet in a comedic twist.
title: Time Unraveled
n_1: On a sunny afternoon, Alex reveals his latest invention to Jamie - a supposed time machine.
c1_1: Guess what? I've invented time travel!
n_2: Alex tinkers with the device, setting the dials for a moment in the past.
c1_2: Let’s visit last week, and I'll tell you the best joke ever.
n_3: They brace themselves, but nothing happens. Alex checks the machine, puzzled.
c2_3: Maybe it's for the best. Your jokes could alter the space-time continuum!
n_4: Jamie smirks, revealing a note from their 'past selves', not fond of the joke Alex was about to repeat.
c2_4: Maybe I did travel back. Your joke about time travel? We didn't like it.
